title: NCL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 270 Assistant Foreman Posts
description: The Northen Coalfields Limited (NCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 270 Assistant Foreman Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application.
